DISTANCE_IS_BETWEEN.sql_template: {source} IS NOT NULL AND {target} IS NOT NULL AND {source} - {target} BETWEEN {0} AND {1}

TIME_DELTA.sql_template: {source} IS NOT NULL AND {target} IS NOT NULL AND {source} - {target} BETWEEN -({days} * {multiplier}) AND ({days} * {multiplier})

IS_IN_SET.sql_template: ({source} IN (SELECT source_uri FROM "__hash({0})") OR {source} IN (SELECT target_uri FROM "__hash({0})")) AND ({target} IN (SELECT source_uri FROM "__hash({0})") OR {target} IN (SELECT target_uri FROM "__hash({0})"))
